title: Tall, Dark...Westmoreland! & The Moretti Seduction
description: Tall, Dark? Westmoreland! Brenda Jackson She longed for a taste of the wild and reckless. And Olivia Jeffries got her chance when she met a handsome stranger at a masquerade ball. The electricity, the attraction was instant. But later she discovered her lover was none other than her father?s rival. She vowed to resist this Westmoreland man? The Moretti Seduction Katherine Garbera To seal the deal that would put his firm back on top, Antonio Moretti would do whatever it took ? even seduce attorney Nathalie Vallerio. Yet Antonio wasn?t prepared for a vixen in a business suit?and neither of them was used to losing. Still, he?d have Nathalie, one way or another.
author: Brenda Jackson
